title: Corelli - 12 Violin Sonatas Op.5 - LP rip!!
description:
The set of two vinyl discs "Corelli - 12 Violin Sonatas Op.5" is converted to a digital mp3 format (bitrate 256kbps) with the help of VK-6-LiveSound audio system which preserves the whole "live" contents of the LPs.
Play the recording via good audio equipment and enjoy the unprecedently natural sounds of violin and basso continuo.
Also listen to my other classical recordings (Handel, Corelli, Telemann, Pergolesi) marked with "LP rip!!"
